dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin take calculated risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly pursue bold opportunities, even if uncertain outcomes are likely.
Your FarTwin will approach new challenges with careful consideration and a preference for stability.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically break down and analyze the problem, seeking logical solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative thinking to identify innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express and validate their feelings, seeking empathy from others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, avoiding unnecessary displays of emotion in public.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek input and advice from others, valuing diverse perspectives.
Your FarTwin will rely solely on their own judgment and experience to make decisions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn and absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer hands-on experience, actively engaging with environments to learn.
Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks to understand new ideas.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will directly challenge and confront the opposing party to resolve disagreements.
Your FarTwin will employ tactful communication, seeking mutually beneficial solutions.

dimensions.label: Creativity Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and intuition to generate innovative ideas.
Your FarTwin will methodically plan and execute creative projects, seeking precision and control.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically engage with and participate in social events, seeking connection.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key settings, conserving energy for personal pursuits.
